abstract.original_text: c. Do not administer corticosteroids. d. Administer antibiotics (cephalosporins, amoxicillin, ampicillin). 8. Administer metoclopramide, 0.2-0.4 mg/kg q8h, or cisapride, 0.5 mg/kg q8h. I. Administer sucralfate suspension or dissolved in water, 0.5-1 g PO q6-8h. 135
